jobTitle: Audit Seniors--New York and New Jersey
jobDescription: Job Description: Mazars USA LLP, the independent U.S. member firm of Mazars Group, ranks as the 24th largest accounting firm in the nation, and the 8th largest firm in the New York metropolitan area. We serve national and international clients from our headquarters in New York City and our offices in New Jersey, Long Island, Chicago, and Pennsylvania. Now is the time to join the changing, growing, and exciting Mazars USA LLP team as we continue to add both breadth and depth to our practice. We have opportunities for Audit Seniors in our New York City office to work with our Audit Groups.
